input.sentences: the first day of the convention was so exciting !
the girls really enjoyed the pink car | it was just their size .
the boys saw a real racecar .
before long the storm troopers invaded the scene .
the memories of the characters we met here will last a lifetime .
output.sentences: Today's seemed like the perfect time to visit a toy convention.
There are toy cars for the girls to see.
The dad's are totally into the big boy stuff.
I almost bumped into the robot's gun.
This cat was surprisingly very bubbly.
